name: Composite Pattern
description: Implement a file system using the composite pattern. Given a structure as nested arrays where strings are files (size = length) and arrays are folders, calculate the total size. Example: ['a.txt', ['subfolder', 'b.txt']] where folder size = sum of contents.
hints: Recursively traverse the structure. Files (strings) return their length. Folders (arrays) return the sum of their children's sizes. The composite pattern treats individual objects and compositions uniformly.
